JavaCool303

Class Cool303Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Component
      • JavaCool303.Cool303Button

  • public class Cool303Button
extends Cool303Component
    A Cool303Button is a Cool303Component wrapper for Swing's JButton.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Component

        theme

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cool303Button(Cool303Theme myTheme)
      Constructor for Cool303Button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTheme()
      With its given theme, the 'applyTheme' method will stylize the button's background color, border, and font (for the label).
      protected java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
      The 'getSwingComponent' method for a Cool303Button returns the underlying JButton, which is intended to allow Cool303Containers to add buttons to AWT/Swing containers.
      java.lang.String getText()
      The 'getText' method retrieves the button's text (label).
      void onClick(java.awt.event.ActionListener buttonListener)
      The 'onClick' method associates the given ActionListener to the underlying JButton when it is clicked.
      void setText(java.lang.String buttonText)
      The 'setText' method sets the button's text (label).

      • Methods inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Component

        getTheme, setTheme

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cool303Button

        public Cool303Button(Cool303Theme myTheme)
        Constructor for Cool303Button. If no theme is given, mostly in the event that it will receive a theme from its parent container, this button will not be stylized.
        Parameters:
        myTheme - Cool303Theme to be applied

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        The 'getText' method retrieves the button's text (label). This method is a wrapper around the JButton method of 'getText.'
        Returns:
        String of the button's text label

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String buttonText)
        The 'setText' method sets the button's text (label). This method is a wrapper around the JButton method of 'setText.'
        Parameters:
        buttonText - The text to be shown on this button

      • getSwingComponent

        protected java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
        The 'getSwingComponent' method for a Cool303Button returns the underlying JButton, which is intended to allow Cool303Containers to add buttons to AWT/Swing containers.
        Specified by:
        getSwingComponent in class Cool303Component
        Returns:

      • onClick

        public void onClick(java.awt.event.ActionListener buttonListener)
        The 'onClick' method associates the given ActionListener to the underlying JButton when it is clicked. This method is a wrapper for the JButton method of 'addActionListener.'
        Parameters:
        buttonListener - The ActionListener to be associated with mouse-click events

      • applyTheme

        public void applyTheme()
        With its given theme, the 'applyTheme' method will stylize the button's background color, border, and font (for the label). If the theme's component color, border, and/or font is not specified, then the box will revert to default styles as specified by the Swing Look-and-Feel.
        Specified by:
        applyTheme in class Cool303Component
